description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Mirror of olden time Border Life, embracing a history of the discovery of America ... also history of Virginia. ... History of the early settlement of Pennsylvania ... to which are added personal narratives ... together with ... sketches of frontier men ... compiled ... by J. Pritts. [Second edition.]" Author: PRITTS, Joseph. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9602.c.3." Page: 410 Place of Publishing: Abingdon Date of Publishing: 1849 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002993824 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
